rooms.title: Twin Room with Lake View
description: Relax in a spacious 40 m² room with a cozy single bed.
Enjoy stunning lake and landmark views from your private balcony or terrace.
Luxury Features: Bathrobe, slippers, free toiletries, and extra-long bed.
Hand sanitiser, air purifiers, carbon monoxide detector, and baby safety gates.
Comfort & Convenience: Private bathroom, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, and heating.
Functional Add-ons: Desk, seating area, electric kettle, and ironing facilities.
Additional Perks: Tile or hardwood flooring, wake-up service, and cleaning essentials.
